text: Ani amhi banu isra'ila (isla'icya mulanna) la samudrapalikade utaravile, maga tyance eka asa jamatijavaluna jane jhale, ji apalya kahi murtya (pratima) ghe'una basali hoti. (Tyanna pahuna he loka) mhanale, he musa! Amacyasathi sud'dha aseca upasya tharavuna dya, jasi yanci hi daivate aheta. Musa mhanale, kharokhara, tumha lokanta mothi murkhata ahe
